imedix
Interface dbGenOperationsInterface

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
dbGenOperations
public interface dbGenOperationsInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote

iMediX Business Logic RMI Server

Developted at Telemedicine Lab, IIT Kharagpur.

This Interface used for Manage Database Operations of iMediX System.

Author:
Saikat Ray.
Telemedicine Lab, IIT Kharagpur, skt.saikat@gmail.com
See Also:
dbGenOperations
